name: Bomberduder
description:
Here's something I threw together in a few days just for fun. It's a Bomberman clone featuring various people from Giant Bomb. I've also added special abilities for funsies. It only supports local multiplayer and 360 controllers.

Controls are

Left Stick to move.

X to place bomb.

A to pick up a bomb you're standing on.

B to stop a kicked bomb.

Y to activate special.

For Brad Shoemaker's special, you use the right stick to apply control to opponents.

N/A in the power description means I didn't implement a power because time issues =P
